creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Taoist priest robe of deep blue satin embroidered with large cranes in couched gold twist.  Collar and front band of medium blue satin and blue twilled silk with dragons and clouds in couched gold threads.  Side borders of dragon medallions, and bottom border of five-clawed dragons, clouds, and the Eternal Sea in couched gold threads.  All borders double-edged with gold braid and gold and black brocade.  Lining of dull yellow silk.
title: Taoist robe
